item.description:
Kind of out-there, but also kind of awesome, no?! I can honestly say I've never seen something like this, but I do look forward to it.

Connors Farm in Danvers is hosting a Singles Night from 6 to 11PM. They have a 7-acre corn maze to get lost in.

Afterward, we'll relax by the bonfire and listen to Moholland Drive (live band) while eating food provided by Champions Barbecue Team and drinking hot/cold apple cider.

It promises to be a fun night, even if you don't meet someone.

We'll meet at 5:30 by the entrance. Bring a flashlight and a sweatshirt.

Tickets are $20 which includes Cover charge, MAiZE pass, and glow stick.

If you can offer a ride for those who are T-bound, please indicate this in your RSVP. Those looking for rides, please indicate this, as well.

Directions:

Take Rte 1 North to North St. in Danvers (Just before the gas stations with the sky signs at the set of lights), Take a right onto North St. Follow it to the end and take a left. We are 1 mile down on the left.
OR
Take 95 North to exit 50. Bear right after leaving the off ramp to Topsfield. At the set of lights before the gas stations take a right. This is North St. Follow it to the end then take a left. We are 1 mile down on the left.
OR
Take 128 to exit 23N. This is Rte. 35 North. Follow it for 5 miles and we are on the left.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me by the entrance

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Get Lost in a Corn Maze: Singles Night
